game.name: Train Simulator: Settle Carlisle Specials Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Settle-Carlisle Specials puts you in the cab of fabulous preserved steam locomotives as they haul trains full of rail fans along the Settle-Carlisle line.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Settle-Carlisle Specials puts you in the cab of fabulous preserved steam locomotives as they haul trains full of rail fans along the Settle-Carlisle line.
